name: Stuck In The Forest
description:
You are stuck in a loop in the forest, defeat the witch to leave the loop.

Give your feedback in the comments.

How to play:

WASD - move

Collect souls to throw them to demons.

Push your allies to save them from death.

This game was made for a game jam: 
https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-113-final-boss

All models and code were made in 48h 

Sounds are from : 

https://freesound.org/
